mapper.insert: insert into lookbook (look_id, look_name, look_photo, look_content, ipgoday) values (#{look_id},#{look_name},#{look_photo}, #{look_content}, now())
mapper.select: select * from lookbook order by num desc limit #{start},#{perpage}
mapper.update: update lookbook set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from lookbook where look_id=#{look_id}
